author: kpedro88
body:
backport of #31733

This backport was done manually, because rebasing after code-format changes is painful.

It is identical to the master PR, except:
* assigning to `std::unique_ptr<>` is apparently a C++17 feature, so one line in `Py8InterfaceBase.cc` had to be changed to use the constructor rather than the assignment operator.
title: Read SLHA from TTree [10_6_X]
